mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hewes, David T.; Norton, Edward M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling Va. Sept 1 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 1861. Send us word at what moment the troops at Fairmont will arrive at Worthington or Shinnston we will meet them from this point in front with a company of infantry and thirty cavalry send balance of regt here immediately DT Hughes [Hewes] & EM Norton 39D112pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hewes, David T.; Norton, Edward M.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
